title: I can't download the PDF report
content:
To download your report successfully, please re-upload the document in question to the Grammarly Editor and see if the issue persists when you try generating a PDF report again.
Alternatively, please try accessing the Online Editor at
https://app.grammarly.com
with your browserâ€™s private mode:
Chrome
Safari
Firefox
Microsoft Edge
To open an Incognito window in Chrome:
Open Chrome and click on
More
(three dots) in the upper right corner of your screen
Select
New Incognito Window
Alternatively, you can use the keyboard shortcut
Command+Shift+N
on Mac or
Ctrl+Shift+N
on Windows.
To open a private window in Safari:
Choose
File
Select
New Private Window
To open a private window in Firefox:
Go to the Firefox Menu.
Select
New Private Window
To open an Incognito window in Microsoft Edge:
Open Microsoft Edge and click on
More
(three dots) in the upper right corner of your screen
Select
New InPrivate Window
